programme.title: Genesis Scottish Open Day 4 2022
programme.desc: Xander Schauffele won the 2022 Scottish Open at 7-under, marking his second straight tournament win

programme.title: Aberdeen Standard Investments Scottish Open Day 4 2020
programme.desc: Xander Schauffele won the Scottish Open with a level-par 70, securing victory despite a shaky front nine and birdies on 14 and 16, finishing ahead of Kurt Kitayama and Joohyung Kim

programme.title: Aberdeen Asset Management Scottish Open Highlights Show 2016
programme.desc: Alex Noren held his nerve at Castle Stuart Golf Links to win his fifth European Tour title

programme.title: Aberdeen Asset Management Scottish Open Highlights Show 2013
programme.desc: Phil Mickelson three-putted the 18th, leading to a playoff, but birdied the first hole to win.

programme.title: Aberdeen Standard Investments Scottish Open Highlights Show 2018
programme.desc: Brandon Stone equalled the lowest round on European Tour history to take his win at the Scottish Open

programme.title: Aberdeen Standard Investments Scottish Open Highlights Show 2019
programme.desc: Bernd Wiesberger stole the title after a tense play off with Aaron Rai

programme.title: Abrdn Scottish Open Highlights Show 2021
programme.desc: Min Woo Lee won the 2021 Abrdn Scottish Open at 18-under, sealing victory in a playoff at Renaissance.

programme.title: Ready Set Golf
programme.desc: Jimmy Bullard & Min Woo Lee take on Tubes & Ángel Hidalgo in a high-speed, three-hole race ahead of the DP World Tour Championship.

programme.title: Genesis Scottish Open Highlights Show 2022
programme.desc: Overnight leader Schauffele shot a level-par 70 recovering from early bogey.

programme.title: Hit The Number Challenge: Rory vs Fleetwood
programme.desc: It’s Rory vs Tommy, as they take on the new 'Hit the Number' Challenge at the Hero Dubai Desert Classic.

programme.title: Luck of The Draw: Lowry vs MacIntyre
programme.desc: Shane Lowry and Bob MacIntyre draw random clubs for each shot at the Luck of the Draw challenge at the Abu Dhabi HSBC Championship.

programme.title: BMW International Open Day 4 2025
programme.desc: Dan Brown secured an emotional two shot victory to lift the 2025 BMW International Open trophy.

programme.desc: Jimmy Bullard & Min Woo Lee take on Tubes & Ángel Hidalgo in a high-speed, three-hole race ahead of the DP World Tour Championship.

programme.desc: The European Tour and Callaway present 'Tour Tips' with Min Woo Lee and Thomas Detry on driver speed.

programme.title: Abrdn Scottish Open Highlights Show 2021
programme.desc: Min Woo Lee won the 2021 Abrdn Scottish Open at 18-under, sealing victory in a playoff at Renaissance.

programme.title: Genesis Scottish Open Day 4 2023
programme.desc: Rory McIlroy won the 2023 Scottish Open at 15-under, securing his first title of the year by two shots.
